## Logger interface

An abstract logger interface, which can be used to customize log behaviour. Usually, you can pass `console` for convinience. Or you can write your own implementation, for example, to report to a log system, or hide some log output.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Logger 
```
